entries.meaning: (organic chemistry) Any salt or ester of formic acid.

verbs.description: formate (third-person singular simple present formates, present participle formating, simple past and past participle formated)

entries.meaning: (aeronautics) To assemble flying aircraft into formation; to fly in formation.
examples: Tiger Moths from the Reserve Flying Schools at Rochester and Cambridge competed with each other at formating in the gusty conditions, Rochester just winning.
